Title: Blistering Belastrasza
Description:
Red whelps can be a little out of control, so best of luck!

|TInterface\ICONS\Ability_FelArakkoa_FelDetonation_Red.BLP:20|t|cFFFF0000|Hspell:408761|h[Ruby Exhaustion]|h|r: Consumes all Vigor over time.
|TInterface\ICONS\Spell_Fire_BurningSpeed.blp:20|t|cFFFF0000|Hspell:408760|h[Crimson Flight]|h|r: Restore all Vigor, boosting forward each time.
|TInterface\ICONS\Ability_PVP_InnerRenewal.BLP:20|t|cFFFF0000|Hspell:408762|h[Renewal]|h|r: Consumes Crimson Flight, resets cooldowns.
ObjectivesText: Help Belastrasza glide through the rings.

Objectives.Text: Start the Race at Celetiros and Complete It
